title: Wilson's Tales of the Borders and of Scotland, Volume 17
author: Alexander Leighton
snippet: After enjoying the splendid prospect from Kellie Law, the party set off forElie, on their way to view the caves in Kincraig Hill.

title: Wilson's Tales of the Borders and of Scotland, Volume 17
author: Alexander Leighton
snippet: From the summit of Kellie Law, onwhich there is a large cairn of stones, one of the most magnificent viewsin Scotland is obtained.

title: Wilson's Tales of the Borders and of Scotland, Volume 17
author: Alexander Leighton
snippet: A vehicle having been hired for the occasion, a drive of about an hourbrought the excursionists to Kellie Law.

title: Wilson's Tales of the Borders and of Scotland, Volume 17
author: Alexander Leighton
snippet: It happened, however, that aday or two previously to his leaving, a party of pleasure was planned forvisiting Kellie Law, near Carnbee, and Macduff's Cave, near Earlsferry.
